name: Advanta Portable Table
descr:
The Advanta`s unique ergonomic design alleviates the strain of unnecessary twisting and reaching. Support your career, your clients, your health with peerlees body mechanics and Advanta`s exceptionally lightweight portability. Available as a package that includes Quick Lock Face Rest, and Arm Rest so that you can make the most of this table`s ergonomic features.

Specifications: 190x70/52,5x52,5/80 cm.
